name: Rise of the Fallen (Skill Card)
text:
Ishizu / Skill
[ACTIVATION]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[EFFECT]
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase. 
Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Fairy monster from your GY in Defense Position, and gain LP equal to its original ATK. 
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
